messages.title: About my technical skills
messages.post:
Languages: HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, JS(ES6), base knowledge of PHP
Frameworks: AngularJS, Vue.js, jQuery, Bootstrap
Other: Gulp, npm

messages.title: Developed Web-applications
messages.post:
• SPA for fitness workouts, with different access levels for training, chat, video contents and conversations with administrators (coach, nutritionist, doctor, etc.) (JS, Vue.js, Websocket, HTML5, CSS3)
  • Admin dashboards for dance studio with schedule of trainings, editing capability of coaches, trainings, clients, kinds of sports, etc. (AngularJS, Bootstrap, html, CSS)
  • Promo page for Lays. Registrations and activations promo codes, personal area.(HTML, JS, CSS)
